pages.text: Players should venture into the Nether once they've invested in a trait that grants access to the dimension. Practitioners of all disciplines must eventually seek the resources of the Nether to continue their progression.
Level 3 Nether Biomes$(li)Arctic Abyss$(li)Corrupted Sands$(li)Fungi Forest$(li)Hell$(li)Phantasmagoric Inferno$(li)Ruthless Sands$(li)Torrid Wasteland$(li)Undergarden$(li)Visceral Heap
